name: eleventy-page-data
description: 11ty/eleventy - [how to access directory specific data from a template in that directory](https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/385)

scripts.development: npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=development npx eleventy --serve
scripts.staging: npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=staging npx eleventy
scripts.production: npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=production npx eleventy
